CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 17, 1952, pg. 5, reads: "Child Care Hearing - Dr. Benjamin Spock, nationally known child care specialist, is shown (left) testifying before the Pittsburgh hearing of the Governor's Committee on Children and Youth Tuesday. Members of the afternoon panel included Judge Gustav L. Schram of Juvenile Court, Herbert Lauterbach of Aliquippa, County Court Judge Lois M. McBride, Robert C. Tabor, a member of the Board of Education in Philadelphia, who served as chairman; Mrs. Alexander Robinson, president of the Pennsylvania Federation of Negro Women's Clubs; Mrs. Richard Backman, Stanton Belfour and Mrs. George West. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. Benjamin Spock standing at podium, with Judge Gustav L. Schram, Herbert Lauterbach, Judge Lois M. McBride, Robert C. Tabor, Mrs. Alexander Robinson, Mrs. Richard Backman, Stanton Belfour, and Mrs. George West, seated on platform, for Pittsburgh hearing of Governor's Committee on Children and Youth
